subject: Madrid Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, who has yet to lose this year, improved his clay-court credentials with a straight-set victory over Rafael Nadal, snapping the Spaniard's 37-match winning streak on the surface.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, who has yet to lose this year, improved his clay-court credentials with a straight-set victory over Rafael Nadal, snapping the Spaniard's 37-match winning streak on the surface.
